entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 6:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
